message.body: a what this could be or where I should have it towed?
need some car advice. car is completely dead. doors won't unlock, no lights, and does nothing when I turn the key. ran perfectly fine on Monday. any ide
If it does nothing at all the battery must be dead or completely disconnected. You can try having it jump started if it's parked somewhere that's doable
Otherwise I recommend having it towed to my mechanics at ###########, at #######################. They're totally friendly and awesome :-)
cool! I have AAA so I could call them for a jump, right? guessing I prob need a new battery. should I go to ur garage to get this?
Their number is ############ if you want to call them. If you talk to a guy named #### just tell him your friend ######## always brings her ####### there and says they're the best ;-)

Oh yeah, definitely call AAA. They can do full battery replacements on site now, I think. But if they can't or really even if they do, you might want to have the car looked over to make sure nothing is draining on the battery
It's weird for one to suddenly die in a day unless you leave lights on our something. Usually you'll notice it being a little sluggish to start and get worse over time
Sorry for novel of texts, hope that helps :-)
ok cool! thanks so much. I'll call both places after I walk #### to ############## for her surgery today. Of course these things never happen at conveni
today. at least I'm off today. which is a big help.
It deffinitely helps! I'll call the garage first and tell them my predicament then call AAA to see if they can get me started so I can drop the car off
Let me know if I can do anything! And good luck to you and #### :)
lly by this afternoon both ###### and car will be on the mend.
U have already helped me tons. If I had to have the same conversation w/ my dad it would have been so stressful. I'll let u know how we make out. hopefu
